title: NOURISHING NATURAL BALM
description: Relieve the sensation of discomfort and tightness on your delicate skin with this intensely nourishing and moisturizing balm. The go-to cream for stressed skin.
cleaned_text: Explore our products and let us advise you the perfect product for your skin. Got any doubts? [Back]() Search here: Connect with our Customer Service experts who are dedicated to answering your questions and helping you discover your spa-quality skincare regimen. Dry, rough, or flaky skin? Restore the feeling of comfort with this natural-origin, ultra-nourishing balm that powerfully hydrates to restore the skin suppleness, softness and beauty. A fundraising product especially recommended for extremely dry, dehydrated skin that feels tight or for those undergoing oncological treatments. Thanks to 100% ingredients of natural origin like the emollient mango and shea butters, the nourishing grape seed (Vitis vinifera) and carrot oils, this creamy, melting balm deeply moisturizes and helps alleviate the feeling of skin discomfort, including dryness, itching and other symptoms of delicate, stressed or sensitized skin. The result is silkier, flexible skin with a great sensation of comfort. From February 1, 2023 to December 31, 2023, Natura Bissé will donate 50% of the net sales price of each NB·Ceutical Nourishing Natural Balm sold in the United States to the Ricardo Fisas Natura Bissé Foundation.
